result.title: A really stupid challenge?
result.content:
Well i know it is not a good idea to plagarize handles but i dnt give a _. I really don't mind how many how meaningless and stupid it is going to sound.

But i wish to challenge tourist in the first Round in CF that happens exactly after 5yrs from now :P Why? The person can get answer in his 'Talks' dated 8 days before from now :3 Thankyou tourist for giving the inspiration _/_ You can take it step further by commenting 'AC' (which i suppose you wont) My first and last attempt at IOI. Blue-Green on CF currently : sweg B|

Pls feel free to drop-down below negative-comments below as many and creative you can think and tell me this is nearly impossible bcoz such comments ‚àù motivation for me :) (and will also help me stay focused so pls go ahead _/_)
